content: talk about texture subtle herringbone stripes combine with a luxe fur trim to make the throw everyone will grab first on a chilly evening you ll love running your hands over the soft fur edging while you cozy up under the weight of this sophisticated blanket sizing/measurements - approximately 38 x 43 downloading - this listing is for the luxe herringbone blanket crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns find more of our easy free crochet blanket patterns here https //makeanddocrew com/category/crochet-throw-blanket-patterns/unique-crochet-blankets/
